title: Kane returns to Wings with 1-year, $3M contract

title: 'Would head back to South Africa': Trump threatens Musk - DOGE may haunt Elon now
content: Donald Trump retaliated against Elon Musk, asserting that the Tesla CEO relies heavily on American government subsidies and would likely return to South Africa without them. Trump criticized the EV mandate, while Musk condemned Trump's spending bill, threatening to form a new political party in response. The dispute highlights contrasting views on government support and political direction.

title: Railways launches new ‚Äòsuper app‚Äô: Book train tickets, track PNR in one place
content: Indian Railways has introduced 'RailOne,' a comprehensive app designed to streamline passenger services. This superapp integrates various functionalities, including ticket booking for reserved, unreserved, and platform tickets, PNR tracking, train status updates, coach positioning etc.

title: Thai PM suspended over leaked call with ex-Cambodian leader- what were they discussing?
content: Thailand's Constitutional Court suspended Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra following a leaked phone call with a former Cambodian leader, sparking public discontent and protests. The leaked audio revealed her critical remarks about a Thai military official and assurances to Hun Sen. Amidst the controversy, a cabinet reshuffle was approved to stabilize the coalition government.

title: MP girl butchered by jilted lover as hospital staff, patients watch helplessly
content: A shocking incident in Madhya Pradesh's Narsinghpur district has sparked outrage after a Class 12 student, Sandhya Chaudhary, was murdered inside the district hospital. The alleged perpetrator, Abhishek Koshti, a jilted lover, attacked her in broad daylight. Despite the presence of hospital staff, no one intervened. Koshti was arrested shortly after, confessing to the crime, citing suspicion of infidelity.

title: Tamil Nadu: 7 killed in explosion at firecracker factory; injured rushed to hospital
content: A devastating explosion at a firecracker factory near Sivakasi, Tamil Nadu, has resulted in the tragic loss of at least four lives. Five individuals sustained injuries in the incident and are currently receiving medical care at a government hospital in Virudhunagar. Authorities are investigating the cause of the explosion at the factory in Chinnakamanpatti.

title: OpenAI is shutting down for the next week; CRO Mark Chen warns employees
content: OpenAI is temporarily closing down operations next week. This is to allow employees to rest after long work hours. Meta is trying to recruit OpenAI staff with high salary offers. Mark Chen warned OpenAI staff about Meta's tactics. Meta recently hired some OpenAI researchers. OpenAI is planning to change its compensation strategy.

title: Telangana factory tragedy: Toll rises to 40; many workers still missing
content: A massive explosion at a Sigachi Industries chemical plant in Telangana's Medak district has claimed 40 lives, with fears the toll may rise. A dryer malfunction is suspected to have triggered the blast, which reduced the facility to rubble. Rescue operations are ongoing, complicated by a lack of information on the number of workers present.

title: IPL: 'Cameraman manages to find me', Kavya Maran on her memes
content: Kavya Maran, CEO of Sunrisers Hyderabad, has addressed her viral reactions during IPL matches, attributing them to her deep personal investment in the team's performance. Under her leadership, SRH has experienced fluctuating success, including a bottom finish in 2023 and a second-place finish in 2024. Maran also oversees the successful Sunrisers Eastern Cape in SA20.

title: Up to Rs 10 lakh more tax on luxury cars in this state: Here's why
content: Maharashtra has increased its one-time registration tax for luxury cars and commercial vehicles, impacting petrol, diesel, CNG, and LNG vehicles. High-end cars priced above Rs 20 lakh will face steeper taxes, potentially adding over Rs 10 lakh to their cost. While electric vehicles remain exempt, goods carriers will now be taxed based on ex-showroom price.

title: Amazon founder‚Äôs last minute text sends plane full of tequila to Venice
content: Venture capitalist Chamath Palihapitiya gifted Jeff Bezos a case of his ultra-premium tequila for his Venice wedding to Lauren S√°nchez. Palihapitiya mentioned Bezos's last-minute request on X. The wedding, a lavish three-day affair reportedly costing $50 million, saw celebrity guests like Bill Gates and Kim Kardashian.

title: Kicked, dragged in front of staff: Odisha bureaucrat assaulted over call with BJP leader
content: In Bhubaneswar, a shocking incident occurred where six individuals assaulted BMC Additional Commissioner Ratnakar Sahu in his office, allegedly over a phone conversation. The attack, which involved dragging and beating Sahu, prompted condemnation from political figures like Aparajita Sarangi and Naveen Patnaik. Police have arrested three individuals, including a BJP corporator, and are investigating further.

title: India-US interim trade deal may be finalised this week
content: India and the US are on the verge of finalizing an interim trade deal, potentially this week, as Indian officials extend their stay in Washington. Negotiations are at a critical point, with India holding firm on market access for agriculture, GM crops, and dairy.

title: ChatGPT warning: OpenAI CEO asks users not to trust AI ‚Äòmuch‚Äô
content: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman cautions users against over-reliance on ChatGPT, highlighting its tendency to 'hallucinate' and produce unreliable information. Despite ongoing advancements and new features, Altman acknowledges the technology's limitations and emphasizes the need for transparency. He also reversed his stance on AI hardware, suggesting that current computers are inadequate for an AI-driven world.

title: Exclusive | Give us 450, we'll give it a good crack - Harry Brook
content: TOI Exclusive | Watched AB de Villers bat for hours and tried to learn what made him special, says England vice-captain Harry Brook ahead of the second Test between India and England, starting from Wednesday at Edgbaston.

title: Happy National Doctor's Day 2025: Top 50 wishes, WhatsApp and Facebook status to share -
content: India observes National Doctor's Day on July 1, 2025, honoring medical professionals' dedication and sacrifices. This day commemorates Dr. Bidhan Chandra Roy, a physician and former Chief Minister of West Bengal. The occasion highlights doctors' crucial role in public health. People express gratitude through messages and social media, acknowledging their unwavering commitment to healing and well-being.

title: ‚ÄòEveryone falls in love‚Äô: Tej Pratap says photos with Anushka are genuine
content: Tej Pratap Yadav, Lalu Prasad's son, has acknowledged the authenticity of his photos with Anushka Yadav, which led to his expulsion from the RJD. Despite the controversy and family discord, he maintains contact with his mother and hopes to return to the party, citing his popularity.

title: HP cloudburst: Flash flood ravages Mandi; houses, vehicles, bridges washed away
content: Flash floods triggered by multiple cloudbursts in Himachal Pradesh's Mandi district have resulted in at least four fatalities and left sixteen individuals missing. The deluge washed away houses, vehicles, and bridges, forcing residents to flee in the darkness. The 16-mw Patikari hydro power project sustained damage, and the Kiratpur-Manali national highway is blocked due to landslides.

title: Jaishankar says India won't be deterred by nuclear blackmail; rebuts Trump
content: External Affairs Minister Jaishankar affirmed India's firm stance against nuclear coercion. He highlighted that terrorists and their state sponsors will face consequences. Jaishankar cited the Pahalgam attack as economic warfare. He mentioned India's retaliatory actions, including Operation Sindoor. He also clarified that trade talks with the US remain unaffected by past India-Pakistan tensions. India maintains a bilateral approach with Pakistan.

title: No fuel for 62L vehicles in Delhi from today: Old CNG vehicles exempted
content: Delhi is set to implement strict rules for end-of-life vehicles. Starting Tuesday, ELVs will not get fuel at city stations. Authorities will impound vehicles older than 15 years (petrol) or 10 years (diesel). ANPR cameras are installed at fuel pumps to identify these vehicles. This action follows NGT and Supreme Court directives.

title: BPSC AE 2025 exam dates announced at bpsc.bihar.gov.in; direct link to full timetable here
content: The Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has released the exam schedule for the Assistant Engineer (AE) recruitment 2025. The written exams will be held on July 17, 18, and 19 in two shifts daily. The exam includes six papers‚Äîfour compulsory and two optional. A total of 1,024 AE posts across Civil, Mechanical, and Electrical disciplines will be filled.

title: Chess | 'Bad blood' - Anish Giri takes fresh jibe at Nakamura and Nepo
content: Anish Giri criticized Ian Nepomniachtchi and Hikaru Nakamura over their protest at the FIDE World Rapid and Blitz Teams event, questioning their sense of entitlement after arriving late and replaying games. Nepo and Nakamura fired back with sarcastic remarks, while Giri insisted he only reacts strongly to perceived injustice.

title: US moves faster to revoke citizenship: Immigrants at risk
content: The Donald Trump administration intensified its focus on revoking US citizenship for naturalized individuals. A Justice Department memo directs attorneys to prioritize civil proceedings against those who obtained citizenship illegally or pose a threat. This impacts roughly 25 million naturalized citizens. The directive targets individuals involved in war crimes, human rights abuses, or criminal activities.

title: 'Not favourable': VP Dhankhar criticises India's political atmosphere
content: Vice President Jagdeep Dhankhar voiced his apprehension regarding the current political climate in India, deeming it unfavorable for democracy. He emphasized that political rivals should not be treated as enemies and urged for improved decorum among lawmakers.

title: Gold price prediction today and in the near-term
content: Gold price prediction today: Gold prices are anticipated to exhibit a slightly bearish trend due to easing geopolitical tensions and positive trade deal discussions ahead of the US tariff deadline. Despite support from ETF inflows and a weaker dollar, focus shifts to trade negotiations and corporate earnings.

title: IAF strip, used in 3 wars, secretly ‚Äòsold off‚Äô using fake papers
content: In a brazen act of deceit, a mother-son duo in Ferozepur, Punjab, allegedly sold off a World War II-era airstrip in 1997, colluding with revenue officials. The Punjab and Haryana High Court intervened, leading to an FIR against Usha Ansal and Naveen Chand after a Vigilance Bureau probe confirmed the land belonged to the Indian Air Force.

title: 38 hrs after AI 171 crash: AI Boeing 777 got stall, GPWS alerts on Delhi take-off
content: Shortly after takeoff from Delhi on June 14, an Air India Boeing 777 bound for Vienna experienced a stall warning and ground proximity warning, leading to a significant altitude loss. Pilots successfully recovered the aircraft, and the flight continued safely to its destination.

title: 'Ugly humour': Turkish cartoonist detained for satire on Prophet Muhammad
content: A Turkish cartoonist was arrested and his magazine targeted after publishing a controversial cartoon depicting the Prophet Muhammad, sparking outrage and reigniting debates over free speech versus religious sensitivity. The cartoon, showing the Prophet Muhammad and Prophet Moses amid missiles, led to an attack on the magazine's headquarters and an investigation for allegedly insulting religious values.

title: Wimbledon Day 1: On sweltering day, Alcaraz stretched to five sets; multiple records set
content: Wimbledon witnessed scorching temperatures and thrilling upsets as defending champion Carlos Alcaraz battled to a five-set victory. Numerous seeds fell, including Daniil Medvedev, while British players achieved a historic presence in the tournament. Taylor Fritz's match was controversially halted due to the 11 pm curfew, leaving him frustrated after a remarkable comeback.

title: 'The America Party': Musk says alternative needed if 'insane spending bill' passes
content: Elon Musk is threatening to form a new "America Party" if Republicans pass Donald Trump's spending bill. He pledged support for primary opponents against GOP members, specifically targeting fiscal conservatives.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens in green; BSE Sensex above 83,600
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in green on Tuesday. While Nifty50 was above 25,500, BSE Sensex was marginally up.

title: ‚ÄòRIP OG‚Äô: NFL mourns death of former Steelers, Bengals DT Oliver Gibson at 53
content: Oliver Gibson, a former NFL defensive tackle for the Steelers and Bengals, has passed away at 53. Known for his toughness and leadership, Gibson played nine seasons after being drafted from Notre Dame. Tributes have poured in from former teammates like Chad Johnson, highlighting his impact on and off the field, especially during his time in Pittsburgh.

title: India tour of England: Kuldeep Yadav's turn to shine at Edgbaston?
content: The Times of India in England: India set to go in with two Spinners in the second Test, starting from Wednesday. Washington Sundar is also in the fray, while Jaspit Bumrah‚Äôs chances of playing is negligible.

title: Shefali Jariwala‚Äôs final hours: Friend Pooja Ghai says she took Vitamin C IV drip
content: Shefali Jariwala‚Äôs close friend and actor Pooja Ghai revealed that Shefali had taken a vitamin C IV drip on the day of her passing. She also revealed that police officers present at Shefali‚Äôs residence summoned the person who had administered the IV drip. The tragic incident reportedly took place between 10 and 11 PM when Shefali collapsed at home. She was immediately rushed to the hospital by Parag Tyagi but could not be revived.

title: IND vs BAN: BCB president provides update on series; scheduled for August
content: The fate of India's scheduled cricket tour to Bangladesh this August hangs in the balance, according to BCB President Aminul Islam. While the itinerary, featuring ODIs and T20Is in Mirpur and Chattogram, was announced earlier, the BCCI is awaiting government approvals before confirming the visit.

title: 'Get your act together!' Trump blasts AT&T after delay in religious call
content: President Trump publicly criticized AT&T on Truth Social for technical difficulties that delayed a conference call with thousands of religious leaders. Trump expressed his frustration over the repeated issues and urged AT&T's leadership to intervene. AT&T responded, attributing the disruption to a problem with the conference call platform and worked to resolve the issue, which caused a 20-minute delay.

title: Court denies bail to 62-year-old for ‚ÄòPakistan zindabad‚Äô post
content: The Allahabad High Court denied bail to a 62-year-old man accused of sharing a "Pakistan Zindabad" post on Facebook. Justice Siddharth stated that judicial tolerance emboldens anti-national acts. The court deemed Ansar Ahmad Siddique's actions disrespectful to the Constitution and a challenge to national sovereignty. Siddique faces charges under the BNS.

title: Deal deadline 8 days away, US talks stay deadlocked
content: With the deadline looming for the US to reinstate reciprocal tariffs, India-US trade talks face a stalemate as New Delhi resists lowering duties on agricultural products like maize and dairy, a key demand from Washington.

title: 'Very strategic ally': White House confirms US-India trade deal 'very close'
content: The White House has reaffirmed the strong strategic alliance between the United States and India, signaling the potential completion of a long-awaited trade agreement. Officials are finalizing the details, with an announcement expected soon from President Trump and his trade team.

title: Punjab farmer missing since 9 days found in Pakistan custody
content: Amritpal Singh, a 23-year-old farmer from Punjab's Ferozepur, has been confirmed to be in Pakistan custody after going missing nine days ago. He is suspected to have crossed the Zero Line at the India-Pakistan border near Rana Panjgrain village. BSF authorities have contacted Pakistan Rangers and are working towards his return, according to his father.

title: Karnataka 2nd PUC exam 3 result 2025 likely today; here‚Äôs when & how to check scorecards
content: Karnataka School Examination and Assessment Board will likely announce the second Pre-University Course Exam 3 results today. Students can check scores on karresults.nic.in or kseab.karnataka.gov.in. Candidates need their register number and date of birth to access results. Exam 3 occurred from June 9 to June 21, 2025. This offers students a third chance to clear exams.

title: Jaishankar at UN: ‚ÄòNo impunity to terrorists‚Äô; slams proxies and nuclear blackmail
content: S. Jaishankar urged the international community to unite against terrorism, emphasizing zero tolerance and accountability. He inaugurated "The Human Cost of Terrorism" exhibition at the UN, showcasing global terror attacks, including the Pahalgam strike. Jaishankar called for exposing state-sponsored terrorism and highlighted the exhibition's tribute to victims, urging the UN to act decisively against this grave threat.

title: 'Kannappa' box office collection: Prabhas-Akshay Kumar's epic mints Rs 2.5cr Monday
content: Vishnu Manchu's mythological drama 'Kannappa' is performing decently at the box office, earning ‚Çπ25.90 crore in its first four days. Despite an expected dip on Monday, the film held well, particularly in Telugu-speaking regions. Directed by Mukesh Kumar Singh, 'Kannappa' tells the story of a tribal warrior and features star cameos from Akshay Kumar, Prabhas and Mohanlal.

title: ‚ÄòThey will lose...‚Äô: Musk slams US lawmakers over support for Trump‚Äôs bill
content: Elon Musk criticized US congress members who supported Donald Trump's tax-and-spending bill, labeling it the "biggest debt increase in history." He vowed to campaign against those who voted for the bill in the next primary election. The legislation, projected to increase the national debt by trillions, has faced backlash from fiscal conservatives, with a final Senate vote expected soon.

title: ‚ÄòSitaare Zameen Par‚Äô: Film inches closer to Rs 130 crore
content: Aamir Khan's 'Sitaare Zameen Par,' also starring Genelia D‚ÄôSouza, continues its successful box office run, nearing Rs. 130 crore after 11 days. Despite new releases, the film maintained a steady performance, outperforming Kajol's 'Maa' on its fourth day. Khan emphasizes the importance of audience support for diverse genres, encouraging filmmakers to explore meaningful stories.

content: the most active month of the 2026 recruiting cycle is drawing to a close . Florida, Texas and Texas A&M led the charge among the nation's recruiting risers . Alabama, LSU and Ohio State stand among the prominent football powers poised to rise in July .

title: Club World Cup offers clues about Messi's role with Argentina in 2026
content: Messi will play for argentina at the 2026 FIFA world cup . the 38-year-old will be playing for his national team next summer . he will play at the international level in a competition he faces week in .

title: Los Angeles Lakers unveil Statement Edition uniforms for 2025-26 season
content: the lakers announced their new statement edition uniform for the 2025-26 season on monday . the uniform also used a purple base, instead of a gold font for the team name and dark color for the number . it will include the team's signature "LA" logo on both sides of the shorts for the first time on a core uniform .

title: As it happened: Jake Paul dominates, defeats Julio Cesar Chavez Jr.
content: the judges scored the fight 99-91, 97-93 and 98-92 . the fight is now riding a six-fight winning streak since losing a split decision to Tommy Fury . Paul defeated former heavyweight king Mike Tyson by unanimous decision in November .

title: Who's next for Ilia Topuria, Charles Oliveira, Alexandre Pantoja after UFC 317?
content: former featherweight champion Ilia Topuria knocked out former lightweight champion Charles Oliveira in the UFC 317 title fight . the men's flyweight division took center stage as topuria picked up knockout wins over Alexander Volkanovski and Max Holloway .

title: Carvajal: 'I'll play anywhere' in Xabi's Madrid setup
content: Dani Carvajal says he is ready to play in any position in Xabi Alonso's team . the 33-year-old has been impressed by new coach xabi alonso tactics . defender will play anywhere, even in between the posts, he says .

content: the 2025 women's european championship kicks off in Switzerland on friday . a is for ... angerer, Nadine: Switzerland's goalkeeping coach and former Germany custodian earns five euros winners' medals .

title: Transfer window: What do Europe's big clubs still need?
content: the transfer window has been a bit different this year thanks to the FIFA Club World Cup . but international deals will be officially going through in the premier league , german Bundesliga , French Ligue 1 , Spanish LaLiga and Italian Serie A on July 1 . we asked our ESPN reporters to assess the business still needing to happen .

title: Can Alcaraz and Gauff win another major? What about Djokovic?
content: defending champion Carlos Alcaraz says he "wants to be ready" for the tournament . the two-time french open champions are among the favorites again as the tournament begins . aryna Sabalenka and Iga Swiatek could win a record-breaking 25th grand Slam title .

title: After a tough French Open, Naomi Osaka is optimistic about Wimbledon
content: Naomi Osaka lost first set to Paula Badosa at the french open last month . the 27-year-old struggled to speak in her news conference soon after . she apologized for cursing before sitting back in her chair .

title: A'ja Wilson, Josh Allen among 2025 ESPYS candidates; vote now
content: the 2025 ESPYS presented by Capital One are July 16 . the Oklahoma City Thunder guard is nominated in two categories: Best Athlete - Men's Sports, and Best NBA Player . Simone Biles and Sydney McLaughlin-Levrone are up for best . Ilona Maher and Ezra Frech represent in both categories .
